title: New ‘Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire’ Trailer Has Arrived
description:
One of the most successful franchise revivals of the past decade has been the Godzilla and King Kong shared universe, aka the MonsterVerse. The film and television multimedia franchise contains several films featuring the iconic monsters, and they’re set to appear again in a new movie. Fans can get a taste of their return with [...]

The post New ‘Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire’ Trailer Has Arrived appeared first on ScreenGeek.
